title: ArtFeed: Philippe Parreno—Two Automatons for One Duet
short_description:
SOLD OUT

list_description:

description:
This event is sold out.

Enjoy an artful brunch hosted by the Evening Associates. Try the bloody mary and screwdriver bar while learning about Philippe Parreno's two installations, My Room Is Another Fish Bowl and With a Rhythmic Instinction to Be Able to Travel beyond Existing Forces of Life. Tour the galleries following your meal.

class="MsoNoSpacing" >Attendees must be 21+. This event is hosted by the Evening Associates. Please use the Modern Wing entrance at 159 East Monroe Street.

#ArtFeedChi @ArtInstitueEA
